channel.title: Some1 help me!
channel.description: how do i play !!!!!!!!!!!! everytime i try to log on it says error connecting to server! must be down! i wont some1 to tell me in steps how to do this now! from the beginning

item.title: Some1 help me!
item.dc:creator: @steve4448 steve4448
item.description:
@steve4448 wrote:

please do not double post edit your messages by pressing modify… and i’m sorry … i’ll put in steps for u …

1)Try differnt servers by going to http://www.flashspace.us/serverstatus.php.

2)Some server might be under updates Now these can last for 1-10 mins.

3)On this forum site you can look for server advertisments … its the same as going to http://www.flashspace.us/serverstatus.php but differnt.

  1. Please post back Or pm me if u still dont understand.

Read full topic

item.title: Some1 help me!
item.dc:creator: @firespell firespell
item.description:
@firespell wrote:

A server is someones computer where they have a program running and that program manages all the other people who want to play on the game.

Go to the server advertisement section and try connecting to a few of them. Eventually you get one that works.

Read full topic

item.title: Some1 help me!
item.dc:creator: @iownuallnoobs iownuallnoobs
item.description:
@iownuallnoobs wrote:

dude. ima go crazy…idk wtf ur talking about what the hell is a server! i said steps![br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2007, 06:15:10 AM[/size][hr]cause i just now heard about this website. :mad:

item.title: Some1 help me!
item.dc:creator: @steve4448 steve4448
item.description:
@steve4448 wrote:

Try lots of differnt servers … most say they are down ( i even have that ) but some still work for me … its just that they are not online at that time, you can keep trying to because they might be under a update for 10 mins OR more. and then they will be back online … you can goto http://www.flashspace.us/serverstatus.php to check online servers or … the advertisments
